snippet.title: Wagotabi (和語旅) - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
🌟 Wishlist on steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2701720/Wagotabi
❤️ Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/wagotabi

=== Description ===

Embark on an immersive educational journey with Wagotabi (和語旅), a game that teaches Japanese from scratch. Explore real Japanese prefectures, understand local culture, and dive into language immersion with this unique learning tool!  

=== Links ===

🌐 Official website - https://www.wagotabi.com/home
📱 Early Access on Google Play in Belgium in New Zealand: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.WagotabiLimited.Wagotabi
⌛ Coming (very) soon on iOS 

=== Credits ===

🎵 Music: Sakuya 2 by PeriTune (https://peritune.com/blog/2016/01/01/sakuya2/)

#Wagotabi #Japanese #LearnJapanese #Education #EdTech #Gaming #Indie #和語旅
